name: extragalactic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or coming from a place outside our galaxy (= one of the independent groups of stars in the universe): Extragalactic astronomy is advancing incredibly quickly, but there is still so much we haven't seen. Different sources of extragalactic radiation have been discovered.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's difficult to know exactly when extragalactic exploration might be possible, but it's probably sooner than we think.Hubble was the first astronomer to detect the existence of extragalactic stars.The performers resembled extragalactic creatures.
